body_html: Sorry, forgot to clarify that I figured out already that the issue is that the weight vector needs to be a Variable and cuda enabled when the rest of your Variables are cuda. Basically either all your Variables are cuda or none of them are cuda. It'd be nice to have this error message check this to help out with debugging for other devs. @jdhao @zou3519 yes that is what I saw until I set the weight Variable as cuda.

body: Sorry, forgot to clarify that I figured out already that the issue is that the weight vector needs to be a Variable and cuda enabled when the rest of your Variables are cuda. Basically either all your Variables are cuda or none of them are cuda. It'd be nice to have this error message check this to help out with debugging for other devs. @jdhao @zou3519 yes that is what I saw until I set the weight Variable as cuda.
